29.ara-name: كتاب الفرائض عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas narrated that :a man died during the time of the Messenger of Allah(S.A.W) ,and he did not leave any heirs except for a slave that he had freed. So the Prophet gave him his inheritance

chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About The Inheritance For The Grandmother
